name: Thunderblades
advancements: Attacking targets from behind increases crit rate of all dual blades attacks by **40%**. Backstabbing an electrified target increases crit rate by **100%** and crit damage by **30%**.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.
Increase damage by **30%** to targets with less than **60%** HP.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by **32%**.
Triggering a Back Attack grants a 100% crit chance for the next **4** seconds and increases crit damage by **50%**. Cooldown: **10** seconds.
After using a skill, increase volt damage dealt to the target by **20%** for **20** seconds.

abilities.name: Twin Blades
abilities.description: While on the ground, swing the blades to attack 5 times in a row.

abilities.name: Sky Flurry
abilities.description: While airborne or after jumping once, tap normal attack to attack 4 times in a row.

abilities.name: Rapid Lunge
abilities.description: After the third normal attack, hold the normal attack button to trigger Rapid Lunge. Strike the target and knock them **into the air**, dealing total damage equal to **116.8%** of ATK + **6**.

abilities.name: Spiral Drive
abilities.description: Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (or tap when a target is selected), or tap normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Spiral Drive. While falling, deal damage equal to **42%** of ATK + **2** each hit.

abilities.name: Sneak Attack
abilities.description: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then tap normal attack to use Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to **570%** of ATK + **30**.

abilities.name: Flying Blades
abilities.description: Tap normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (tap an arrow button before dodging) to trigger Flying Blades. Slash a target **5** times, each dealing damage equal to **26.4%** of ATK + **1**. Grant immunity to control effects while phasing.

abilities.name: Dodge
abilities.description: Dodge right before getting hit to activate a Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the red area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. While dodging, you gain hitstun immunity for **0.5** seconds.

abilities.name: Returning Blades
abilities.description: Fires 6 returning blades, each dealing damage equal to **52.8%** of ATK + **3**. Gains **hyperbody** for up to **8** seconds, and the effect is removed when the blades return. **45**-second cooldown.

abilities.name: Orbiting Blades
abilities.description: When ***weapon charge is full*** or ***Phantasia*** is triggered, **remove all debuffs from the wielder** and blink to the target location upon switching to this weapon and attack, dealing damage equal to **86.9%** of ATK + **5** and electrocuting the target (after **5** seconds, deals volt damage equal to **15%** of damage dealt, up to **350%** of the Wanderer's ATK. This is an abnormal status that can be dispelled). Also spawn 3 blades that orbit around the Wanderer, dealing damage equal to **65.2%** of ATK + **3** to those that touch them.

recommendedMatrices.name: Samir
recommendedMatrices.description: Thunderblades are capable of keeping up the damage buff when used correctly.

recommendedMatrices.name: Crow
recommendedMatrices.description: At high crit rate, Crow's 2 set is the second best choice for damage.

recommendedMatrices.name: Shiro
recommendedMatrices.description: Not ideal, but can be used for the damage increase until you get one of the more recommended sets.

recommendedMatrices.name: Sobek
recommendedMatrices.description: A good substitute for SSR damage chips if you don't have them. Very useful against groups of mobs, i.e. in Bygone Phantasm.
